name: unicornfinance
description: Our goal is to create re-usable sample apps that external developer can leverage as reference.

scripts.build: cd client && yarn install  && yarn run build
scripts.local: yarn run client-dependencies &&  concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn server:dev" "yarn client" --success
scripts.start: yarn run client-dependencies &&  concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn server:prod" "yarn client" --success
